abstract: In a showdown over shareholders’ rights to be decided Tuesday, the largest public pension fund in the nation is fighting to give investors the power to nominate directors at UnitedHealth Group, the biggest company entangled in the stock-option backdating scandal.
lead_paragraph: In a showdown over shareholders’ rights to be decided Tuesday, the largest public pension fund in the nation is fighting to give investors the power to nominate directors at UnitedHealth Group, the biggest company entangled in the stock-option backdating scandal.

headline.main: Calpers Backs Shareholder Rights Bill at UnitedHealth
